member.name: PROPDESC_VIEW_FLAGS
member.summary: These flags describe properties in property description list strings.

member.name: PROPDESC_VIEW_FLAGS.PDVF_RIGHTALIGN
member.summary: This property should be right aligned.

member.name: PROPDESC_VIEW_FLAGS.PDVF_BEGINNEWGROUP
member.summary: Show this property as the beginning of the next collection of properties in the view.

member.name: PROPDESC_VIEW_FLAGS.PDVF_FILLAREA
member.summary: Fill the remainder of the view area with the content of this property.

member.name: PROPDESC_VIEW_FLAGS.PDVF_SORTDESCENDING
member.summary: Sort this property in reverse (descending) order. Applies to a property in a list of sorted properties.

member.name: PROPDESC_VIEW_FLAGS.PDVF_SHOWONLYIFPRESENT
member.summary: Show this property only if it is present.

member.name: PROPDESC_VIEW_FLAGS.PDVF_SHOWBYDEFAULT
member.summary: This property should be shown by default in a view (where applicable).

member.name: PROPDESC_VIEW_FLAGS.PDVF_SHOWINPRIMARYLIST
member.summary: This property should be shown by default in the primary column selection UI.

member.name: PROPDESC_VIEW_FLAGS.PDVF_SHOWINSECONDARYLIST
member.summary: This property should be shown by default in the secondary column selection UI.

member.name: PROPDESC_VIEW_FLAGS.PDVF_HIDELABEL
member.summary: Hide the label of this property if the view normally shows the label.

member.name: PROPDESC_VIEW_FLAGS.PDVF_HIDDEN
member.summary: This property should not be displayed as a column in the UI.

member.name: PROPDESC_VIEW_FLAGS.PDVF_CANWRAP
member.summary: This property can be wrapped to the next row.

member.name: PROPDESC_VIEW_FLAGS.PDVF_MASK_ALL
member.summary: A mask used to retrieve all flags.
